metadata.title: 5305-1 -- MariaDB vulnerabilities
metadata.description: Several security issues were discovered in MariaDB and this update includes new upstream MariaDB versions to fix these issues.  MariaDB has been updated to 10.3.34 in Ubuntu 20.04 LTS and to 10.5.15 in Ubuntu 21.10.  In addition to security fixes, the updated packages contain bug fixes, new features, and possibly incompatible changes.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo ua fix USN-5305-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  mariadb-plugin-cracklib-password-check - 1:10.5.15-0ubuntu0.21.10.1 mariadb-backup - 1:10.5.15-0ubuntu0.21.10.1 mariadb-plugin-connect - 1:10.5.15-0ubuntu0.21.10.1 mariadb-plugin-spider - 1:10.5.15-0ubuntu0.21.10.1 libmariadb-dev - 1:10.5.15-0ubuntu0.21.10.1 libmariadb3 - 1:10.5.15-0ubuntu0.21.10.1 libmariadbd19 - 1:10.5.15-0ubuntu0.21.10.1 mariadb-client-core-10.5 - 1:10.5.15-0ubuntu0.21.10.1 mariadb-plugin-s3 - 1:10.5.15-0ubuntu0.21.10.1 mariadb-plugin-mroonga - 1:10.5.15-0ubuntu0.21.10.1 mariadb-client - 1:10.5.15-0ubuntu0.21.10.1 mariadb-plugin-gssapi-client - 1:10.5.15-0ubuntu0.21.10.1 mariadb-server-core-10.5 - 1:10.5.15-0ubuntu0.21.10.1 mariadb-server-10.5 - 1:10.5.15-0ubuntu0.21.10.1 mariadb-test-data - 1:10.5.15-0ubuntu0.21.10.1 mariadb-client-10.5 - 1:10.5.15-0ubuntu0.21.10.1 mariadb-plugin-rocksdb - 1:10.5.15-0ubuntu0.21.10.1 mariadb-server - 1:10.5.15-0ubuntu0.21.10.1 libmariadbd-dev - 1:10.5.15-0ubuntu0.21.10.1 libmariadb-dev-compat - 1:10.5.15-0ubuntu0.21.10.1 mariadb-plugin-gssapi-server - 1:10.5.15-0ubuntu0.21.10.1 mariadb-common - 1:10.5.15-0ubuntu0.21.10.1 mariadb-plugin-oqgraph - 1:10.5.15-0ubuntu0.21.10.1 mariadb-test - 1:10.5.15-0ubuntu0.21.10.1 No subscription required
